The US — a land where anyone from anywhere can pick up their spatula for debate and comment publicly on any topic of their liking — and The Netherlands — a tightly knit society where one must be related by blood, word or deed before being qualified to develop a concurred opinion without first having gone through a rigorous vaccination program of insult

River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, but the crowning descision made by director Vincent Ward is the complete lack of subtitles for the Maori dialect even when non-Maori characters are speaking to each other.

The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his finger tips go white. His wife had gastric bypass and hysterectomy surgery in season 1 so what was left of his hair probably fell out then. That would

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life as a Zucchini.
My Life as a Zucchini is a movie with beautiful drawings by a pretty traditional plot. Brother's relationship between siblings, hate between siblings are the main theme here. But this movie has found a way to revisit the story and provides a different look

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three starring the martial artist. The film was shot in the Philippines, and it shows with the difference in culture, colors, and thick jungle. The film has a simple story, but the action scenes steal the show, with most of the filming done at night,
